articles.title: Xavi ready to lead Barcelona away from 'difficult moment in club's history' - ESPN
articles.description: New Barcelona coach Xavi Hernandez said his first task will be to restore order as he takes over at "a difficult moment in the club's history."
articles.content:
New Barcelona coach Xavi Hernandez has said his first task will be to set out a series of rules for the players to restore order as he takes over at "a difficult moment in the club's history."
